title: Yakult Singapore Factory Tour for an Education
blurb: Educational tour of its state-of-the-art plant.
description: Since 1987, Yakult Singapore has welcomed visitors for an educational tour of its state-of-the-art plant. To date, more than 470,000 people have visited our plant, ranging from preschoolers (5 years old and above) to senior citizens from grassroots, community centers, private organisations, government bodies and educational institutions of all levels. The tour provides insights into the production process of Yakult and its health benefits, making it a family-friendly and educational experience for all ages.
datetime_display: sations, government bodies and educational institutions of all levels
Keyword_tag: Factory tour, educational tour, Yakult, health, probiotics, family activity, kids activity, school tour

title: Yakult Factory Tour
blurb: Visit the Yakult factory and learn about probiotics.
description: Embark on an educational journey at the Yakult Factory Tour, where you'll discover the fascinating world of probiotics and the production process of Yakult. This family-friendly tour offers an engaging experience for all ages, providing insights into the health benefits of Yakult and the science behind its creation. Witness firsthand how Yakult is made, from the initial fermentation to the final packaging, and gain a deeper understanding of the importance of gut health. The tour is designed to be both informative and entertaining, making it a perfect outing for families and individuals interested in learning more about this popular probiotic drink. Explore the state-of-the-art facilities and learn about the rigorous quality control measures that ensure the safety and efficacy of Yakult. A visit to the Yakult Factory is an enriching experience that combines education and fun, leaving you with a newfound appreciation for the science of probiotics.
Keyword_tag: Yakult, Factory Tour, Probiotics, Health, Family, Educational, Singapore

title: Yakult Factory Tour at Senoko Avenue, Singapore
blurb: Explore the Yakult factory and learn about its production.
description: Embark on an educational journey at the Yakult factory, where you'll discover the fascinating process behind creating this popular probiotic drink. The tour is designed for families and children, offering insights into the science and technology involved in Yakult production. Witness firsthand how Yakult is made, from the initial fermentation to the final packaging. The tour is suitable for all ages, providing an engaging and informative experience for both kids and adults. Learn about the health benefits of probiotics and the importance of a balanced diet. The factory tour offers a unique opportunity to see the inner workings of a modern food production facility, making it an ideal outing for families and school groups. The tour includes interactive elements and visual displays to enhance the learning experience, ensuring that visitors of all ages can grasp the key concepts. Discover the history of Yakult and its global impact, while gaining a deeper understanding of the science behind this iconic beverage. The tour is conducted in a family-friendly manner, with guides who are knowledgeable and passionate about sharing their expertise. The Yakult factory tour is an excellent way to combine education with entertainment, providing a memorable and enriching experience for the whole family.
datetime_display: Mondays to Fridays (exclude public holidays). Morning session: 10.00am – 11.30am or 9.30am – 11.00am. Afternoon session: 2.00pm – 3.30pm. Mid session: 11.30am – 1.00pm (School Holiday period only)
Keyword_tag: Yakult, Factory Tour, Probiotic Drink, Health, Education, Family, Kids, Singapore, Senoko Avenue, School Holiday
